column.name: organizer_id
column.valueNumeric: select id from Organizer where name = '${organizer-neuseen-hero}'

column.name: location_country_id
column.valueNumeric: select id from Country where name = '${country-germany}'

column.name: event_id
column.valueNumeric: select id from Event where name = '${2017-neuseen-trailrun}'

column.name: category_id

column.name: event_id
column.valueNumeric: select id from Event where name = '${2017-spartan-race-sprint-muenchen}' and start_date = '2017-04-08'

column.name: category_id
column.valueNumeric: select id from Category where name = '${category-hindernislauf}'

column.name: note
column.value: 2 x 30 Burpees Strafe für nicht geschaffte Hindernisse (Speerwurf, Kletterwand mit Ketten und Löcher)
